law.catch_line: Functions of board -- Authority to promulgate administrative regulations.

text.section:
The board may:
Promulgate administrative regulations necessary to maintain a program of continuing education for licensees. Continuing education requirements shall be determined by administrative regulation of the board. No requirement for continuing education shall exceed fifteen (15) hours per year; and
Adopt all reasonable administrative regulations consistent with this chapter that are necessary to carry into effect the purposes of this chapter.

law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 14, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 291, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 21.
